Header.title: Welcome to AIB Estate Planning
Header.paragraph: Protect your home, wealth and loved ones with expert estate planning services from AIB. We're here to help you plan for the future.

About.paragraph: At AIB Estate Planning, we understand that protecting the things you care about most - your home, your assets, and your family - is your top priority. Our team of expert estate planners is here to guide you through the process of creating a comprehensive plan that ensures your final wishes are carried out and your loved ones are taken care of.
Why: Personalised service tailored to your needs
Wide range of services including Wills, Trusts, LPAs
Giving you peace of mind about the future
Why2: Regulated by the SRA and FCA for your protection
Transparent and caring service focused on you
Helping you make the right decisions for your estate
Supporting you in planning for whatever life brings

Services.name: Wills
Services.text: Ensure your estate is distributed according to your wishes by putting a legally valid Will in place. Don't leave it up to the government to decide.

Services.name: Power of Attorney
Services.text: Choose someone you trust to manage your affairs if you become unable to do so yourself. Get peace of mind with a Lasting Power of Attorney.

Services.name: Trusts
Services.text: Protect your assets, provide for your loved ones, and possibly mitigate inheritance tax by setting up the appropriate Trusts for your situation.

Services.name: Property Trusts
Services.text: Make sure your share in a jointly owned property ends up with your chosen beneficiaries by severing the tenancy and creating a Trust.

Services.name: Probate
Services.text: Get expert assistance in handling the legal and administrative process of closing out an estate after a death. We're here to help.

Services.name: Funeral Plans
Services.text: Take the burden off your family by putting financial arrangements in place now to cover your funeral costs when the time comes.
